Pre-Game Insights: The favored Yankees have -144 moneyline odds against the underdog Cubs, who are listed at +122.
New York is a 1.5-run favorite (at +120 odds).
The total is 7.5 runs for the matchup.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees have been favorites in 110 games this season and won 61 (55.5%) of those contests.
New York has a record of 40-30 in games when sportsbooks favor them by at least -144 on the moneyline.
The implied probability of a win from the Yankees, based on the moneyline, is 59%.
The Cubs have been victorious in 34, or 47.9%, of the 71 contests they have been chosen as underdogs in this season.
Chicago has a mark of 12-10 in contests where oddsmakers favor it by +122 or worse on the moneyline.
The moneyline set for this matchup implies the Cubs have a 45% chance of coming away with a victory in the contest.
